attributes.action: Paying rent in private rented has a positive impact on your credit score
attributes.background: Make it easier for people who are paying mega high rent get a mortgage easier by your rent payments having a positive impact on your credit score

rejection.details:
Not the Government/Parliament’s responsibility

Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about when to offer a mortgage are a matter for individual mortgage providers, not the Government or Parliament.
